archimate:BusinessActor.name: Semantic Web Company GmbH
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation:
The company supports over 180 organizations, including over 50 Forbes Global 2000 companies, in the development of semantic AI solutions based on knowledge graphs. The Vienna-based company has been a pioneer in the field of the Semantic Web for over 15 years and has subsidiaries in the USA, France and in the UK https://www.poolparty.biz/contact/
